name: v_app_demo
description: A simple chat demo for Socket.IO

scripts.start_app: bash -c " npm run build  " &&  bash -c " npm run start_server  "
scripts.start_dev: start bash -c " nodemon --exec npm run build  " &&  bash -c " npm run start_server  "
scripts.build: bash -c " npx webpack " && bash -c " node SOURCE/FrontEnd/v_modules/autorefresh_browser/json_updater.js; "  && bash -c " node-sass -r SOURCE/FrontEnd/scss -o PUBLIC/assets/style/css  "
